name: Out of Controls!
description:
'Out of Controls' is a very short platform puzzle game about a robot named GR0VER who has to escape the laboratory. But there's problem - some of your vital player controls are missing.... You're Out of Controls!!! With your limited controls, move through the rooms and successfully navigate the obstacles to get additional player controls to make navigation easier. But don't get to complacent, because not all controls are as they seem.

This is a playable concept game created in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam. 

Enjoy! Trumpet Weasel 

PS. I'm kinda new to this, so I'd welcome any feedback.
